dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S112 IS: Make the Migrant Protection Protocols Mandatory Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Blackburn (for herself, Mr. Daines, Mr. Risch, Mr. Sheehy, Mr. Crapo, Mr. Rounds, Mr. Moran, and Mr. Tillis) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend section 235(b)(2)(C) of the Immigration and Nationality Act to require the implementation of the Migrant Protection Protocols.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Make the Migrant Protection Protocols Mandatory Act of 2025.

section.header: Mandatory implementation of the Migrant Protection Protocols
section.text: Section 235(b)(2)(C) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1225(b)(2)(C)) is amended by striking may and inserting shall.
